definition: the people one depends upon for one's livelihood/one's bread and butter
like a second parent (idiom); one's great benefactor
in place of sb's parents/in loco parentis (law)
one depends on one's parents when at home, and on one's friends when away from home (idiom)
pinyin: zai4 jia1 kao4 fu4 mu3 , chu1 wai4 kao4 peng2 you5
containing_words.word: 在家靠父母，出外靠朋友

definition: one depends on one's parents when at home, and on one's friends when away from home (idiom)
pinyin: zai4 jia1 kao4 fu4 mu3 , chu1 men2 kao4 peng2 you5
containing_words.word: 在家靠父母，出门靠朋友

definition: to have lost both one's parents

sentences.english: LJ says his parents aren’t home, but they will be soon.
sentences.chinese: LJ告诉他父母并不在家，但很快会回来的。

sentences.english: It was fine at first; most of my friends had moved home too.
sentences.chinese: 起初我觉得还好，我的很多朋友也都回家投靠父母了。

sentences.english: Whoso curseth his father or his mother, his lamp shall be put out in obscure darkness.
sentences.chinese: 咒骂父母的，他的灯必灭，变为漆黑的黑暗。

sentences.english: Our parents didn't want us to marry, so we eloped .
sentences.chinese: 我们的父母亲不同意我们结婚，所以我们便私奔。

sentences.english: Albert Einstein's parents feared he was sub-normal.
sentences.chinese: 爱因斯坦的父母当初曾经担心他发育不正常。

sentences.english: Fortunately, most people in the world really are good parents.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是，世界上大多数父母都是好父母。

sentences.english: Fortunately, most people in the world really are good parents.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是，世界上大多数父母都是好父母。

sentences.english: I was in my parents' debt.
sentences.chinese: 我欠下了我父母的人情债。

sentences.english: She is an obedient girl and always obeys her parents.
sentences.chinese: 她是个顺从的孩子，总是服从父母。

sentences.english: Playing computer games all day lavishes parents' hard-earned money.
sentences.chinese: 整天玩电脑游戏浪费父母的血汗钱。

sentences.english: Please give my love to your parents.
sentences.chinese: 顺便请代向你父母问候。

sentences.english: My parents jack up my allowance, and I ll be maxing on cash.
sentences.chinese: 我的父母增加我的零用钱，我的现金就会很宽裕了。

sentences.english: Fourteen of us won't be flying to Tonks's parents'.
sentences.chinese: 我们十四个人并不都飞往唐克斯的父母家。

sentences.english: Joyfully, he embraced and kissed his parents and Aksah.
sentences.chinese: 他开心地拥抱，亲吻他的父母，还有阿克萨。

sentences.english: My parents speak and act like "old children", often make people laugh.
sentences.chinese: 我父母的说话做事像个“老顽童”，常让人忍俊不禁。

sentences.english: Most parents are anxious for their children's advancement.
sentences.chinese: 大多数父母都为自己孩子的进步感到焦虑。

definition: head of a household/family head/patriarch/parent or guardian of a child
